reviewText: This was in excellent condition when it arrived. Our product arrived before scheduled date.  I would will definately be using amazon.com for future purchases. I recommend to all my friends. This purchase has 4 dvds and all are wonderful.

I Purchased A Pup Named Scooby Doo it is One of My Favorites Cartoon's win I was A Little Girl & For My Sister Kids to Watch it All The Time I Love to Watch Scooby Cartoon's and Movie's4 Kid Favorites: A Pup Named Scooby-Doo (Volumes 1-4) My Favorites Episodes of A Pup Named Scooby Doo is Now Museum Now You Don't, Scooby Dude, The Spirit of Rock 'n' Roll, The Ghost of Mrs, Shusham, Curse of The Collar,Night of The Living Burger, The Story Stick, The Weredog of Doo Manor, Dinkley 2000 and Chickenstein Lives My Favorites Scooby Doo Showing and Movies are TV Show's 1. my kids are loving this and I get the memories growing up
I loved these episodes as a kid & I was so thrilled to find them on DVD to pass on to my little one. Great price too!
Good, but the bar code sticker was removed rather haphazardly making the case look ragged. Overall, product was fine.
Not giving 5 stars because there is no volume 5-7 which you have to buy them individually.
My great grandkids really love watching them.
Great to have if you don't want to get the full season sets.

Both my 4 year old son and my 2 year old daughter love Scooby Doo. They watch some of the movies, as well as episodes from the 1960s/1970s series. Initially, I wasn't sure if the Pup Named Scooby Doo series would be too "babyish" for them, but they LOVE it. It is not at all scary, but very cute and funny. For example, in each episode during the chase scene everyone stops to dance - including the monster. It's definitely a fun little show and my kids really get a kick out of it.
These DVDs are great for road trips or when I need to keep the kids busy while I am using sharp gardening tools.  Great for all those Scooby-doo fans out there!
